sourcesContent:
const { DataTypes } = require("sequelize");

module.exports = (sequelize) => {
  const attributes = {
    campaignId: {
      type: DataTypes.STRING(8),
      allowNull: false,
      defaultValue: null,
      primaryKey: true,
      autoIncrement: false,
      comment: null,
      field: "campaignId",
    },
    durationInMonths: {
      type: DataTypes.INTEGER,
      allowNull: false,
      defaultValue: null,
      primaryKey: false,
      autoIncrement: false,
      comment: null,
      field: "durationInMonths",
    },
    budget: {
      type: DataTypes.STRING(45),
      allowNull: false,
      defaultValue: null,
      primaryKey: false,
      autoIncrement: false,
      comment: null,
      field: "budget",
    },
    name: {
      type: DataTypes.STRING(45),
      allowNull: false,
      defaultValue: null,
      primaryKey: false,
      autoIncrement: false,
      comment: null,
      field: "name",
    },
    campaignScript: {
      type: DataTypes.STRING(45),
      allowNull: true,
      defaultValue: null,
      primaryKey: false,
      autoIncrement: false,
      comment: null,
      field: "campaignScript",
    },
    campaignChannels: {
      type: DataTypes.STRING(45),
      allowNull: true,
      defaultValue: null,
      primaryKey: false,
      autoIncrement: false,
      comment: null,
      field: "campaignChannels",
    },
    isActive: {
      type: DataTypes.INTEGER,
      allowNull: false,
      defaultValue: "1",
      primaryKey: false,
      autoIncrement: false,
      comment: null,
      field: "isActive",
    },
    ageMin: {
      type: DataTypes.STRING(45),
      allowNull: true,
      defaultValue: null,
      primaryKey: false,
      autoIncrement: false,
      comment: null,
      field: "ageMin",
    },
    ageMax: {
      type: DataTypes.STRING(45),
      allowNull: true,
      defaultValue: null,
      primaryKey: false,
      autoIncrement: false,
      comment: null,
      field: "ageMax",
    },
    gender: {
      type: DataTypes.STRING(45),
      allowNull: true,
      defaultValue: null,
      primaryKey: false,
      autoIncrement: false,
      comment: null,
      field: "gender",
    },
    location: {
      type: DataTypes.STRING(45),
      allowNull: true,
      defaultValue: null,
      primaryKey: false,
      autoIncrement: false,
      comment: null,
      field: "location",
    },
    companyId: {
      type: DataTypes.STRING(45),
      allowNull: true,
      defaultValue: null,
      primaryKey: false,
      autoIncrement: false,
      comment: null,
      field: "companyId",
    },
    addedOn: {
      type: DataTypes.DATE,
      allowNull: false,
      defaultValue: sequelize.literal("CURRENT_TIMESTAMP"),
      primaryKey: false,
      autoIncrement: false,
      comment: null,
      field: "addedOn",
    },
    updatedOn: {
      type: DataTypes.DATE,
      allowNull: false,
      defaultValue: sequelize.literal("CURRENT_TIMESTAMP"),
      primaryKey: false,
      autoIncrement: false,
      comment: null,
      field: "updatedOn",
    },
  };
  const options = {
    tableName: "campaign",
    comment: "",
    indexes: [],
    timestamps: false,
  };
  const CampaignModel = sequelize.define("campaign_model", attributes, options);
  return CampaignModel;
};
